response.original_title: Portrait of a Legend : Frank Sinatra
response.overview: This release features 2 back-to-back programs. Frank Sinatra - The Man And His Music - Portrait Of A Legend movie First, a legendary program thought lost forever- a concert in which Frank, Judy Garland and Dean Martin perform an entire show together in color and stereo! Then look back at the brilliant career of the man himself with clips from every stage of his amazing life in 'The Man and His Music.'.
response.title: Portrait of a Legend : Frank Sinatra

results.name: Dean Martin: Portrait of a Legend - documentary (part 1 of 3)
